Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Jerry \Jer"ry\, a. Flimsy; jerry-built. -- {Jer"ry*ism}, n. [Both Builder's Cant] [Webster 1913 Suppl.]
Jerry n : offensive terms for a person of German descent [syn: {Kraut}, {Krauthead}, {Boche}, {Hun}]
